Sleep.combatLogCast: %C casts Sleep. %O is unable to attack for the next turn.
Sleep.combatLogProc: %O is unable to attack because they are asleep.
Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.description: Your opponent may not attack on their next turn.

Poison Barb.name: Poison Barb
Poison Barb.description: If successful, your opponent will be poisoned. They will take damage at the start of each of their next 3 turns.

Invisibility.combatLogProc: The attack misses because %c is invisible!
Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: You turn invisible until your next attack. While invisible, attacks against you are less likely to succeed.

Barkskin.combatLogProc: The attack is reduced because of Barkskin.
Barkskin.name: Barkskin
Barkskin.description: Until combat ends, damage against you is reduced.

Charm.combatLogProc: %O is unable to attack because they are charmed.
Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description: Your opponent may not attack on their next 1 or more turns.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Melee attack: A powerful chomp to your opponent.

Claw.name: Claw
Claw.description: Melee attack: A strong but inconsistent slashing claw.

Club.name: Club
Club.description: Melee attack: An unwieldy but powerful strike.
